title: Understanding Slicers
text: Slicers are visual filters that allow you to segment data in a PivotTable. They provide a quick way to filter data visually and see what items are filtered.

title: Using Slicers Effectively
text: To use a slicer, you need to click on the items you want to filter. You can select multiple items by holding down the CTRL key while clicking.

hintAnswer: $$CTRL+click$$ the slicer to remove the data
title: Removing Data with Slicers
text: How can you remove data from the slicer selection?
choices: $$CTRL+click$$ the slicer to remove the data
"slicer" function is treated as a summary function
